Hello every body,
I'm performing unit tests on a JAVA project using Junit and Ant.
I'm using Ant to execute the Junit tests and to generate the unit test report .
The problem is that I want to use the attribute [frames] (in order to obtain a html report with frames), but it doesn't work when I launvh the Ant task.
It works only when I launch the task with the attribute [noframes], and of course obtain a report with no frames!

<report format="noframes" todir="${test-report.dir}" />
 
The error which raise, is the following :
 
[junitreport] jar:file:/E:/eclipse/version3.1/plugins/org.apache.ant_1.6.5/lib/ant-junit.jar!/org/apache/tools/ant/taskdefs/optional/junit/xsl/junit-frames.xsl; Line 37; Column -1; javax.xml.transform.TransformerException: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: redirect
